theVacant:VacantStarterRelic.NAME: Wretched Gem
theVacant:VacantStarterRelic.FLAVOR: A cursed trap that contains your soul.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, if you are #ythevacant:Healthy, lose #b2 Max HP. If you are #ythevacant:Hollow, gain #b4 Max HP. You can't go below #b50 Max HP this way.

theVacant:Deathbell.NAME: Deathbell
theVacant:Deathbell.FLAVOR: The scent invokes a feeling of dread.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, if you are #ythevacant:Hollow, gain 10 #yTemporary_HP.

theVacant:BoundSoul.NAME: Bound Soul
theVacant:BoundSoul.FLAVOR: As death closes in, the artifact's hold on you weakens, and you feel your power grow.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn if you are #ythevacant:Hollow.

theVacant:LocketRelic.NAME: Locket Piece
theVacant:LocketRelic.FLAVOR: A reminder of a life lost. Or at least, a piece of one.

theVacant:TombstoneRelic.NAME: Tombstone
theVacant:TombstoneRelic.FLAVOR: Just as we all go to the grave eventually, all cards go to the discard pile eventually.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, after you draw, #ythevacant:Mill your draw pile.

theVacant:CrystalBallRelic.NAME: Cracked Crystal Ball
theVacant:CrystalBallRelic.FLAVOR: Sometimes magic leaking into the world is more powerful than when it is contained.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yExhausted cards return to your draw pile after 2 turns.

theVacant:RagRelic.NAME: Polishing Rag
theVacant:RagRelic.FLAVOR: Shiny gems are more powerful, everyone knows this.

theVacant:BrassGoblet.NAME: Brass Goblet
theVacant:BrassGoblet.FLAVOR: An ancient artifact with dark power.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b

theVacant:OverflowingGobletRelic.NAME: Overflowing Goblet
theVacant:OverflowingGobletRelic.FLAVOR: An ancient artifact, now overflowing with dark power.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yBrass #yGoblet. At the start of combat, gain #b

theVacant:BoundSoulOld.NAME: Bound Soul Old
DESCRIPTIONS: Enter [#66eeee]Solemn[] [#66eeee]Form[] at the start of a turn if you are above half HP. NL Enter [#ee4200]Fury[] [#ee4200]Form[] when you take damage. NL Enter [#ee82ee]Void[] [#ee82ee]Form[] when your draw pile contains 0 cards.
